mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, goodsname, goodscode, housename, deptpartname, goodsunit, nums, validity, goodsnorms, organization, createuser, createtime, company, nuitPrice, quantity, amount, remark, createdate, batchnum, regisnum, productionPlace, incode, userdocument, goodsuuid,phids
mapper.select: SELECT a.amount, a.batchnum, a.company, a.createdate, a.createtime, a.createuser, a.goodscode, a.goodsname, a.goodsnorms, a.goodsunit, a.deptpartname, a.incode, a.nuitPrice, a.nums, a.organization, a.productionPlace, a.quantity, a.regisnum, a.remark, a.SEQ_ID, a.validity, a.userdocument, a.goodsuuid, b.USER_NAME, c.house, c.deptpart, d.DEPTNAME, e.housename, a.phids FROM HUDH_GOOGS_DOCTOR_PICK_IN_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON b ON a.createuser = b.seq_id LEFT JOIN HUDH_KSLL_GOODS c ON a.goodsuuid=c.id LEFT JOIN KQDS_CK_DEPT d ON d.SEQ_ID=c.deptpart LEFT JOIN KQDS_CK_HOUSE e ON e.SEQ_ID=c.house where a.SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:

update HUDH_GOOGS_DOCTOR_PICK_IN_DETAIL
goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
